title: Leading Ebola Doctor Stricken With The Disease Himself
teaser: Dr. Sheik Umar Khan, the head doctor fighting the Ebola virus outbreak in Sierra Leone, has begun to exhibit symptoms of the disease. For more details on the situation, Audie Cornish speaks with Dr. Daniel G. Bausch, a colleague of Khan's and an associate professor at the Tulane School of Public Health and Tropical Medicine.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
